definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: In principle, the execution should occur only once.
sentences.chinese: 原则上，该代码应该仅执行一次。

sentences.english: Basically, clubs could not be initiatively closed.
sentences.chinese: 棋社原则上不能主动要求关闭。

sentences.english: In principle a volcano can erupt at any time, day and night.
sentences.chinese: 原则上说，火山随时都会爆发，不分昼夜。

sentences.english: While this is true in principle, it is very different in practice.
sentences.chinese: 然而，虽然原则上来说这是真的，实际上却大相径庭。

sentences.english: As a rule, people are good listeners.
sentences.chinese: 原则上讲，人们都是不错的聆听者。

sentences.english: Why would it be wrong in principle to tax the rich to help the poor?
sentences.chinese: 为何向富人征税救济穷人在原则上是错的？

sentences.english: In principal, other languages or libraries could offer knowledge of terminal characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 原则上，其它语言或库可以提供终端特征的信息。

sentences.english: In principle a modest dose of controlled inflation might work wonders.
sentences.chinese: 原则上，适度的可控性的通胀可能会产生奇效。

sentences.english: The RV144 trial suggests that an AIDS vaccine can indeed work in principle.
sentences.chinese: RV144试验表明，艾滋病疫苗原则上确实有效。

sentences.english: In principle, backface culling is pretty simple.
sentences.chinese: 原则上，阴影切除是很简单。

sentences.english: In principle, the coordination meeting shall be convened once every year.
sentences.chinese: 协调会议原则上每年召开一次。

sentences.english: Naturalism is not incompatible in principle with all forms of religion.
sentences.chinese: 原则上自然主义并不与所有的宗教形式不相容。

sentences.english: I am officially too pale to be allowed outside in summer.
sentences.chinese: 因为我太白了，原则上夏天是不准外出的。

sentences.english: The Collaboration is dedicated to consumer involvement in principle.
sentences.chinese: 合作潜心于原则上包括的用户。

sentences.english: Universal Pictures agreed, in principle, to the concept of film residuals.
sentences.chinese: 环球营业原则上同意了电影剩余工资的概念。

sentences.english: F In principle, the prelate of the First Order is without authority over the nuns.
sentences.chinese: 在原则上，总主教的第一个命令是没有权力修女。
